Review: The Force Awakens

26 December 2015

by: Ryan Howard

We hope you've been enjoying our roundtable of "The Force Awakens," but in case you wanted to see a more formal review one of us wrote about the movie, you can check out Ryan's write-up at our sister blog, Matinee Culture.

Be forewarned: as you've seen from the roundtables, he wasn't a big fan.
